emuInput.TitMainTitle: Joseph Watts wearing round sign inscribed "I am a good Democrat, let's vote out the bad ones, pull 2nd lever"
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 11, 1961, pg. 2, reads: "Candidates Work Hard in Victory Quest - 'Rebel' Democrat - 'Rebel' Democrat Committeeman Joseph Watts, Sixth District, 13th Ward, right charged party brass was stingy with patronage to Negroes. He urged Democrats to vote Republican, much to the delight of W. P. Young, GOP stalwart.  Watt's sign (inset) tells the story. - Harris Photos."
